Acly/krita-ai-diffusion

AI image generation inside Krita with Stable Diffusion

View on index

Related repos

  • AI image generation toolkit using Stable Diffusion models
  • Modular web UI for Stable Diffusion image generation, focused on performance and easy access to advanced tools
  • stable diffusion image generation web interface
  • open-source diffusion engine for AI image and video generation
  • Scans your AI-generated images, grabs all the metadata and workflow info, and lets you search, tag, and organize everything—handy for keeping track of your Stable Diffusion creations
  • real-time AI image generation pipeline with high throughput and energy efficiency
  • Diffusion transformer for image generation with sub-second latency
  • Open source toolkit for training diffusion image models with a simple web or command line interface—supports latest models, requires high-end Nvidia GPU
  • control diffusion models with extra conditions for image generation
